QuestData.Title: Elekks Are Serious Business
QuestData.Description: Is he crazy? Entrusting something like this to some no-named $r youngling!$B$BJust remember this kid: You'll never make it as a Hand of Argus! You don't have the guts!$B$BI guess I'll have to humor him this time. Speak with Vorkhan at Kessel's Crossing on Bloodmyst Isle. Just follow the road north from here, and when it forks, just keep on going north.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Vorkhan the Elekk Herder on Bloodmyst Isle.
QuestData.RewardText: Well ya made it this far! Let's put ya to work before you get too bloodied up.
